info.title: 4IR Management (Industry & Industry Association API Service)
info.description: 'It is a Industry & Industry Association api service For 4IR Module'

post.description: API endpoint to Insert a FourIR Occupation. A successful request response will show 200 HTTP status code

put.description: API endpoint to update a 4IR Occupation. A successful request response will show 200 HTTP status code

delete.description: API endpoint to delete a 4IR Occupation. A successful request response will show 200 HTTP status code
